zone.name: HL7 - Zone
zone.description: All logic for building HL7 messages goes here to contain the blast radius of a release and have a known impact area

publishedFunction.name: process_ADT
publishedFunction.description: This function determines which Hl7 ADT message to generate and calls the appropriate generation code.

variable.name: HL7_CODE_VERSION
variable.description: A manual version number, reved by development as an attempt to know what code has been promoted to each environment.
